title: CE60046: Soil Exploration - Quick Facts
text:
CE60046
Course name | Soil Exploration
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Planning of Geotechnical exploration, methods of boring, types of samples and sampling, non-destructive testing, field tests: standard penetration, plate load, static and dynamic cone penetration, field vane shear and pressuremeter tests, electrical resistivity and seismic refraction tests, location of ground water table, processing of soil exploration data and its interpretation, Offshore exploration.
